about_the_game:
Interested in how Shoppe Keep 2 came to be? Come along for the journey, as the artists at Strangefire take you from the conceptual stages, to final art assets in this informative and beautiful digital PDF art book.

The Shoppe Keep 2 Digital Art Book is a full color, 32 page PDF. With several chapters focusing on scenery, the town, characters, creatures and more, you’ll lose yourself in the world of Customerania. Beautiful concept art, 3D models and screenshots populate this art book, alongside informative and interesting captions from the artists at Strangefire.

As with the nature of Shoppe Keep 2, this digital art book is a work in progress. At no extra cost to Shoppe Keep 2 Digital Art Book owners, new chapters will be added to the PDF book as the game evolves through Early Access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Delve deeper into Shoppe Keep 2’s fascinating creative process, with the Shoppe Keep 2 Digital Art Book.
